title: In game Recorder
body:
Hey guys, can't say I've been here in a while, though then again can't say i have posted a new video in a while.

With all the recent patches lolreplay, baronreplays, opggrecorder and LSI have all been having issues with recording footage from spectator view, let it be it wont load at all, you only get some footage or all the files are corrupted. 

We really do need an in game recorder, even a basic one as the constant issues that content creators get from haivng to scrounge around in the 3rd party software area just isn't fun at all.

Latest video I've put out, currently lolreplay and baronreplay still having minor problems, LSI working as intended and opgg still dropping half the recording in some circumstances.

replies.body: LSI is good but there is no camera rotation, so making fancy footage can be tough
I recently ditched LolReplay for LSI but LSI isnt recording games even though i have set up my account and uninstalled LoLReplay. Any ideas?

I've been having troubles with LolReplay/BaronReplay but LolSummonerInformation (LSI) is working perfectly. Personally I think it's a better, more comprehensive program than the other two so I'd highly recommend using it.

Couldn't agree more on the ingame replay system, it's astonishing it hasn't been implemented yet - so many other games have it, it can't be that difficult to put in!
